articles.title: Shifting Focus, NATO Views China as a Global Security Challenge - The New York Times
articles.description: NATO leaders expressed a new concern about China’s growing military might, signaling a fundamental shift in the attentions of an alliance devoted to protecting Europe and North America — not Asia.

articles.title: Exclusive: Companies face a financial risk from the climate crisis. States want them to reveal just how much - CNN Philippines
articles.description: Corporate America must be compelled to fess up about the financial risks posed by the climate crisis, a coalition of state attorneys general told the Securities and Exchange Commission on Monday.

articles.title: Bank of America CEO details back-to-office plan, concentrating on Covid-vaccinated employees first - CNBC
articles.description: Bank of America CEO Brian Moynihan told CNBC the company's back-to-work plan focuses on vaccinated employees for now.

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Germany not underdogs vs France, says Neuer - Goal.com
articles.description: The 10 South American countries participating in the 2021 Copa America will be split up into two groups of five. The top four in each group will advance to the single-elimination knockout stage, which kicks off with the quarterfinals.
